content: It‚Äôs not just VC - there is pressure in executive leadership roles to be further and further from the work itself. You don‚Äôt have to do that - you may not be the critical path engineer anymore, but you can stay writing code forever if you want/like it.

content.value:
I‚Äôve been told by some VCs not to code at all, because of how it will make me look ‚ÄúJunior.‚Äù

I learn so much more by actually writing the code than by reading about the product. This may seem obvious to a programmer. But I promise you it‚Äôs not obvious to most VCs.
